actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on: (1) dicyclopentenyloxyethyl methacrylate; (2) 4,5-dichloro-2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (4,5-dichloroocthilinone; (3) 3,5-dichloro-n-(1,1-dimethyl-z-propynl) benzamide (pronamide); (4) mixtures of 4,5-dichloro-2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (4,5-dichlorocthilinone with application adjuvants, with or without stabilizers; and (5) mixtures of 3,5-dichoro-n-(1,1-dimethyl-2-propynl) benzamide (pronamide) with application adjuvants.

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.
